action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

# yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
yum -y remove firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname @@{MASTER_HOSTNAME}@@

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install epel-release

echo "epel-release repository installed!" >> ~/status.txt

# sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

#curl -o bootstrap-salt.sh -L https://bootstrap.saltstack.com
#sudo sh bootstrap-salt.sh -M -N git develop

yum -y install salt-master

# make sure the salt binaries were installed correctly
# installation failure won't cause the script to stop unless we manually exit with an error code here
[ -e /usr/bin/salt ] && echo "salt binary found" || exit $?

sleep 3

systemctl enable salt-master.service
systemctl start salt-master.service

echo "salt-master enabled and started!" >> ~/status.txt

# bind to and listen on the host IP address only
sed -i -- 's/#interface: 0.0.0.0/interface: @@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@/' /etc/salt/master

echo '@@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@ salt' | tee -a /etc/hosts

mkdir -p /srv/salt
mkdir -p /srv/salt/all
mkdir -p /srv/salt/dbserver
mkdir -p /srv/salt/webserver
mkdir -p /srv/salt/haproxyserver

echo "global
  log 127.0.0.1 local0
  log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
  maxconn 4096
  quiet
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
defaults
  log     global
  mode    http
  retries 3
  timeout client 50s
  timeout connect 5s
  timeout server 50s
  option dontlognull
  option httplog
  option redispatch
  balance  roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen stats 0.0.0.0:8080
  mode http
  log global
  stats enable
  stats hide-version
  stats refresh 30s
  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
frontend http
  maxconn 2000
  bind 0.0.0.0:80
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | tee /srv/salt/haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg

echo "server {
    listen   80 default_server;
    server_name  _;

    root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
    index index.php index.html index.htm;

    location / {
        try_files \$uri \$uri/ =404;
    }
    error_page 404 /404.html;
    error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
    location = /50x.html {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
    }

    location ~ \.php\$ {
        try_files \$uri =404;
        fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php-fpm/php-fpm.sock;
        fastcgi_index index.php;
        fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME \$document_root\$fastcgi_script_name;
        include fastcgi_params;
    }
}" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/default.conf

echo "user nginx;
worker_processes auto;
error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;
pid /run/nginx.pid;

# Load dynamic modules. See /usr/share/nginx/README.dynamic.
include /usr/share/nginx/modules/*.conf;

events {
    worker_connections 1024;
}

http {
    log_format  main  '\$remote_addr - \$remote_user [\$time_local] \"\$request\" '
                      '\$status \$body_bytes_sent \"\$http_referer\" '
                      '\"\$http_user_agent\" \"\$http_x_forwarded_for\"';

    access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

    sendfile            on;
    tcp_nopush          on;
    tcp_nodelay         on;
    keepalive_timeout   65;
    types_hash_max_size 2048;

    include             /etc/nginx/mime.types;
    default_type        application/octet-stream;

    # Load modular configuration files from the /etc/nginx/conf.d directory.
    # See http://nginx.org/en/docs/ngx_core_module.html#include
    # for more information.
    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;

}" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/nginx.conf

echo "<?php

phpinfo();" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/index.php

echo "if [ ! -e /usr/local/bin/composer ]
then
  curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer -o /root/installer
  php /root/installer >> /root/composer.txt
  mv /root/composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
  chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer
fi
yum-config-manager --enable remi-php71
yum -y --enablerepo=remi,remi-php71 install php-fpm php-common php-openssl php-pdo php-mbstring php-tokenizer php-xml php-ctype php-json php-zip
composer global require \"laravel/installer\"" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/composer.sh

echo "base:
  '*':
    - all
  'dbminion*':
    - dbserver
  'webminion*':
    - webserver
  'haproxy*':
    - haproxyserver" | tee /srv/salt/top.sls
echo "pkg.upgrade:
  module.run
all.packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - git" | tee /srv/salt/all/init.sls
      
echo "database.packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - mariadb-server
  service.running:
    - name: mariadb
    - enable: True
app_database:
  mysql_database.present:
    - name: @@{DATABASE_NAME}@@
    - connection_host: 127.0.0.1
    - connection_user: root
add-user:
  mysql_user.present:
    - host: 127.0.0.1
    - name: @@{DATABASE_USER}@@
    - password: @@{DATABASE_PASSWORD}@@
    - connection_user: root
    - connection_charset: utf8
delete-existing-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='@@{DATABASE_USER}@@' AND Host NOT IN ('localhost', '127.0.0.1', '::1');\"
delete-blank-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='';\"
grant-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON @@{DATABASE_NAME}@@.* TO '@@{DATABASE_USER}@@'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '@@{DATABASE_PASSWORD}@@';\"
flush-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"FLUSH PRIVILEGES\"" | tee /srv/salt/dbserver/init.sls
    
echo "/root/composer.sh:
  cmd.wait:
    - watch:
      - pkg: php7-packages
  file.managed:
    - source: salt://webserver/composer.sh
php7-setup:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - rpm -Uvh --replacepkgs http://rpms.remirepo.net/enterprise/remi-release-7.rpm
php7-packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - php-fpm
      - php-common
      - php-cli
      - php-pdo
      - php-mysqlnd
  environ.setenv:
    - name: HOME
    - value: /root
    - update_minion: True
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sh /root/composer.sh
nginx:
  pkg.installed: []
  service.running:
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/nginx/*
    - require:
      - pkg: nginx
  file.managed:
    - name: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
    - source: salt://webserver/nginx.conf
    - require:
      - pkg: nginx
/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:
  file:
    - managed
    - source: salt://webserver/default.conf
/usr/share/nginx/html/index.php:
  file:
    - managed
    - source: salt://webserver/index.php
/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf:
  file:
    - managed
php-fpm:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sed -i -- 's/user = apache/user = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/group = apache/group = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/;listen.owner = nobody/listen.owner = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/;listen.group = nobody/listen.group = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/listen = 127.0.0.1:9000/listen = \/var\/run\/php-fpm\/php-fpm.sock/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/;cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/' /etc/php.ini
  service.running:
    - name: php-fpm
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/php-fpm.d/*" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/init.sls
     
echo "haproxy:
  pkg.installed: []
  service.running:
    - name: haproxy
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
  file.managed:
    - name: /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
    - source: salt://haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg
    - require:
      - pkg: haproxy" | tee /srv/salt/haproxyserver/init.sls

# systemctl restart salt-master

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
yum -y install epel-release
yum -y remove firewalld

# MySQL-python is required for SaltStack MySQL modules
yum -y install MySQL-python

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname @@{name}@@

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install epel-release

echo "epel-release repository installed!" >> ~/status.txt

#sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

#!/bin/sh

#curl -o bootstrap-salt.sh -L https://bootstrap.saltstack.com
#sudo sh bootstrap-salt.sh git develop

yum -y install salt-minion

sleep 3

systemctl enable salt-minion.service
systemctl start salt-minion.service

echo "salt-minion enabled and started!" >> ~/status.txt

echo '@@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@ salt' | tee -a /etc/hosts

sed -i -- 's/#master: salt/master: @@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@/' /etc/salt/minion

systemctl restart salt-minion

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebMinion.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

port=80
for host in $hosts
do
   echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | tee -a /srv/salt/haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg
done

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

# restart the salt-master service in case changes have been made to Salt states
# systemctl restart salt-master

# give the salt-master service time to restart and calm down a bit
# sleep 5

# show some info about the minions with approved keys
salt-key -L
salt '*' test.ping

# apply states to all Salt minions
salt '*' state.apply

#!/bin/sh

salt '*' test.ping

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

# yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
yum -y remove firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname @@{MASTER_HOSTNAME}@@

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install epel-release

echo "epel-release repository installed!" >> ~/status.txt

# sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

#curl -o bootstrap-salt.sh -L https://bootstrap.saltstack.com
#sudo sh bootstrap-salt.sh -M -N git develop

yum -y install salt-master

# make sure the salt binaries were installed correctly
# installation failure won't cause the script to stop unless we manually exit with an error code here
[ -e /usr/bin/salt ] && echo "salt binary found" || exit $?

sleep 3

systemctl enable salt-master.service
systemctl start salt-master.service

echo "salt-master enabled and started!" >> ~/status.txt

# bind to and listen on the host IP address only
sed -i -- 's/#interface: 0.0.0.0/interface: @@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@/' /etc/salt/master

echo '@@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@ salt' | tee -a /etc/hosts

mkdir -p /srv/salt
mkdir -p /srv/salt/all
mkdir -p /srv/salt/dbserver
mkdir -p /srv/salt/webserver
mkdir -p /srv/salt/haproxyserver

echo "global
  log 127.0.0.1 local0
  log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
  maxconn 4096
  quiet
  user haproxy
  group haproxy
defaults
  log     global
  mode    http
  retries 3
  timeout client 50s
  timeout connect 5s
  timeout server 50s
  option dontlognull
  option httplog
  option redispatch
  balance  roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen stats 0.0.0.0:8080
  mode http
  log global
  stats enable
  stats hide-version
  stats refresh 30s
  stats show-node
  stats uri /stats
frontend http
  maxconn 2000
  bind 0.0.0.0:80
  default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | tee /srv/salt/haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg

echo "server {
    listen   80 default_server;
    server_name  _;

    root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
    index index.php index.html index.htm;

    location / {
        try_files \$uri \$uri/ =404;
    }
    error_page 404 /404.html;
    error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
    location = /50x.html {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
    }

    location ~ \.php\$ {
        try_files \$uri =404;
        fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php-fpm/php-fpm.sock;
        fastcgi_index index.php;
        fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME \$document_root\$fastcgi_script_name;
        include fastcgi_params;
    }
}" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/default.conf

echo "user nginx;
worker_processes auto;
error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;
pid /run/nginx.pid;

# Load dynamic modules. See /usr/share/nginx/README.dynamic.
include /usr/share/nginx/modules/*.conf;

events {
    worker_connections 1024;
}

http {
    log_format  main  '\$remote_addr - \$remote_user [\$time_local] \"\$request\" '
                      '\$status \$body_bytes_sent \"\$http_referer\" '
                      '\"\$http_user_agent\" \"\$http_x_forwarded_for\"';

    access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

    sendfile            on;
    tcp_nopush          on;
    tcp_nodelay         on;
    keepalive_timeout   65;
    types_hash_max_size 2048;

    include             /etc/nginx/mime.types;
    default_type        application/octet-stream;

    # Load modular configuration files from the /etc/nginx/conf.d directory.
    # See http://nginx.org/en/docs/ngx_core_module.html#include
    # for more information.
    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;

}" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/nginx.conf

echo "<?php

phpinfo();" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/index.php

echo "if [ ! -e /usr/local/bin/composer ]
then
  curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer -o /root/installer
  php /root/installer >> /root/composer.txt
  mv /root/composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
  chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer
fi
yum-config-manager --enable remi-php71
yum -y --enablerepo=remi,remi-php71 install php-fpm php-common php-openssl php-pdo php-mbstring php-tokenizer php-xml php-ctype php-json php-zip
composer global require \"laravel/installer\"" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/composer.sh

echo "base:
  '*':
    - all
  'dbminion*':
    - dbserver
  'webminion*':
    - webserver
  'haproxy*':
    - haproxyserver" | tee /srv/salt/top.sls
echo "pkg.upgrade:
  module.run
all.packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - git" | tee /srv/salt/all/init.sls
      
echo "database.packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - mariadb-server
  service.running:
    - name: mariadb
    - enable: True
app_database:
  mysql_database.present:
    - name: @@{DATABASE_NAME}@@
    - connection_host: 127.0.0.1
    - connection_user: root
add-user:
  mysql_user.present:
    - host: 127.0.0.1
    - name: @@{DATABASE_USER}@@
    - password: @@{DATABASE_PASSWORD}@@
    - connection_user: root
    - connection_charset: utf8
delete-existing-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='@@{DATABASE_USER}@@' AND Host NOT IN ('localhost', '127.0.0.1', '::1');\"
delete-blank-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"DELETE FROM mysql.user WHERE User='';\"
grant-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON @@{DATABASE_NAME}@@.* TO '@@{DATABASE_USER}@@'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '@@{DATABASE_PASSWORD}@@';\"
flush-privileges:
  mysql_query.run:
    - database: app
    - query: \"FLUSH PRIVILEGES\"" | tee /srv/salt/dbserver/init.sls
    
echo "/root/composer.sh:
  cmd.wait:
    - watch:
      - pkg: php7-packages
  file.managed:
    - source: salt://webserver/composer.sh
php7-setup:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - rpm -Uvh --replacepkgs http://rpms.remirepo.net/enterprise/remi-release-7.rpm
php7-packages:
  pkg.installed:
    - pkgs:
      - php-fpm
      - php-common
      - php-cli
      - php-pdo
      - php-mysqlnd
  environ.setenv:
    - name: HOME
    - value: /root
    - update_minion: True
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sh /root/composer.sh
nginx:
  pkg.installed: []
  service.running:
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/nginx/*
    - require:
      - pkg: nginx
  file.managed:
    - name: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
    - source: salt://webserver/nginx.conf
    - require:
      - pkg: nginx
/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:
  file:
    - managed
    - source: salt://webserver/default.conf
/usr/share/nginx/html/index.php:
  file:
    - managed
    - source: salt://webserver/index.php
/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf:
  file:
    - managed
php-fpm:
  cmd.run:
    - names:
      - sed -i -- 's/user = apache/user = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/group = apache/group = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/;listen.owner = nobody/listen.owner = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/;listen.group = nobody/listen.group = nginx/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/listen = 127.0.0.1:9000/listen = \/var\/run\/php-fpm\/php-fpm.sock/' /etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
      - sed -i -- 's/;cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/' /etc/php.ini
  service.running:
    - name: php-fpm
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/php-fpm.d/*" | tee /srv/salt/webserver/init.sls
     
echo "haproxy:
  pkg.installed: []
  service.running:
    - name: haproxy
    - enable: True
    - full_restart: True
    - watch:
      - file: /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
  file.managed:
    - name: /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
    - source: salt://haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg
    - require:
      - pkg: haproxy" | tee /srv/salt/haproxyserver/init.sls

# systemctl restart salt-master

action_list.name: action_delete

#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
yum -y install epel-release
yum -y remove firewalld

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname @@{name}@@

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install epel-release

echo "epel-release repository installed!" >> ~/status.txt

#sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

#!/bin/sh

#curl -o bootstrap-salt.sh -L https://bootstrap.saltstack.com
#sudo sh bootstrap-salt.sh git develop

yum -y install salt-minion

sleep 3

systemctl enable salt-minion.service
systemctl start salt-minion.service

echo "salt-minion enabled and started!" >> ~/status.txt

echo '@@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@ salt' | tee -a /etc/hosts

sed -i -- 's/#master: salt/master: @@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@/' /etc/salt/minion

systemctl restart salt-minion

#!/bin/sh

yum -y update
yum -y upgrade

yum -y install net-tools bind-utils bash-completion nano
yum -y install epel-release
yum -y remove firewalld

# MySQL-python is required for SaltStack MySQL modules
yum -y install MySQL-python

echo "yum updates completed!" >> ~/status.txt

hostnamectl set-hostname @@{name}@@

echo "hostname configured!" >> ~/status.txt

yum -y install epel-release

echo "epel-release repository installed!" >> ~/status.txt

#sed -i -- 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config

systemctl enable salt-minion.service
systemctl start salt-minion.service

echo "salt-minion enabled and started!" >> ~/status.txt

echo '@@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@ salt' | tee -a /etc/hosts

sed -i -- 's/#master: salt/master: @@{SaltStackMaster.address}@@/' /etc/salt/minion

systemctl restart salt-minion

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebMinion.address}@@" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")

port=80
for host in $hosts
do
   echo "  server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | tee -a /srv/salt/haproxyserver/haproxy.cfg
done

#!/bin/sh

# restart the salt-master service in case changes have been made to Salt states
# systemctl restart salt-master

# give the salt-master service time to restart and calm down a bit
# sleep 5

# show some info about the minions with approved keys
salt-key -L
salt '*' test.ping

# apply states to all Salt minions
salt '*' state.apply

#!/bin/sh

salt '*' test.ping
